questions: _  will be important in  our future life.
article:
Scientists say life will be very different in 2050.
First,there will be no TV channels in 2050.People will choose a program from a computer and watch it on TV.In 2050,we will get information from the computers only.
Second,water will be a big problem in 2050.In many places,people won't have water to drink.
Third,cars will use new and clean fuels and they will go very fast.There will be a computer in every car.And the computers will control the cars and there won't be any accidents .
